examples: It's not some form of inner radiance.
The smooth surface of the carved, painted wood connotes cleanliness and health, with the triangular brass ornaments reflecting light and adding to its radiance when danced.
words.defineEn: an attractive combination of good health and happiness
words.defineVi: một sự kết hợp hấp dẫn của sức khỏe tốt và hạnh phúc

examples: The girl with the carrot top confidently embraces her unique hair color, radiating a sense of individuality.
They are the belles of the ball, radiating beauty and elegance as they dance.
Yesterday, Emily dressed in her Sunday best for the wedding ceremony, radiating beauty and charm in her exquisite gown.
By next month, she'll have got it going on even more, enhancing her natural beauty and radiating confidence.
Those electrons will radiate a small number of gamma rays.
words.defineEn: extend or spread outward from a center or focus or inward towards a center
words.defineVi: mở rộng hoặc lan rộng ra ngoài từ một trung tâm hoặc tiêu điểm hoặc hướng vào trong một trung tâm

examples: Maybe forensics will have better luck.
- No. - Doing some forensics.
The insurance company calls in a forensic meteorologist.
A forensic test could have detected the synthetic resin.
Sciences from anthropology to zoology have been put to forensic use.
words.defineEn: of, relating to, or used in public debate or argument
words.defineVi: của, liên quan đến, hoặc được sử dụng trong cuộc tranh luận hoặc tranh luận công khai

words.defineEn: a field of science that through the practice of scientific techniques, etc. helps the police in their cases
words.defineVi: một lĩnh vực khoa học thông qua thực hành các kỹ thuật khoa học, v.v. giúp cảnh sát trong các trường hợp của họ

examples: You have a prophecy?
So this is prophecy.
Which lead to apocalyptic prophecies.
Or is this prophecy just ungrounded panic?
But the witches do light up his ambition with their prophecies.
words.defineEn: knowledge of the future (usually said to be obtained from a divine source)
words.defineVi: kiến thức về tương lai (thường được cho là có được từ một nguồn thiêng liêng)

examples: Just as Rasputin prophesied, his murder was swiftly followed by that of the royal family.
African and Spanish sailors trade insults while a Tahitian seaman longs for home, Chinese and Portuguese crewmembers call for a dance, and one young boy prophesies disaster.

But then when this becomes apparent that there might actually be a banking crisis going on, because all of these banks were doing this, all of these actually formal banks or even informal financial institutions were doing this trade, and it could bring down the entire Thai financial system, it became even a more self-fulfilling prophesy.
words.defineEn: predict or reveal through, or as if through, divine inspiration
words.defineVi: dự đoán hoặc tiết lộ thông qua, hoặc như thể thông qua, nguồn cảm hứng thiêng liêng

examples: Yes the freckles are benign!
But, in Asian myths, dragons are often benign.
There’s even a term for this: benign masochism.
See, sometimes, the BRAF mutation just causes benign moles instead of melanoma.
But inflation isn’t just some benign force.
words.defineEn: pleasant and beneficial in nature or influence
words.defineVi: dễ chịu và có lợi trong tự nhiên hoặc ảnh hưởng

words.defineEn: a kind act
words.defineVi: một hành động tử tế

examples: To be held in high esteem.
In order to build your self-esteem, set yourself targets you can reach.
I've got low self esteem.
Self-hatred, self-loathing, low self esteem, no self confidence.
And repetitively leaving things undone chips away at your motivation and self esteem.
words.defineEn: to greatly admire or respect someone or something
words.defineVi: để rất ngưỡng mộ hoặc tôn trọng một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó

words.defineEn: worthy of admiration and respect
words.defineVi: đáng được ngưỡng mộ và tôn trọng

examples: These people mostly are just oral.
The other thing is sometimes for oral deaf.
There are oral deaf.
Pringle Alim: Your oral health is a part of your overall health.
Oral folklore, religion, and literary history all have a hand in creating this monster.
words.defineEn: involving or related to the mouth
words.defineVi: liên quan đến hoặc liên quan đến miệng

words.defineEn: talk pompously
words.defineVi: nói chuyện khoa trương

words.defineEn: a lengthy musical composition with a religious theme based on the Bible written for orchestra, choirs and singers without using costumes, action or any scenery
words.defineVi: một tác phẩm âm nhạc dài với chủ đề tôn giáo dựa trên Kinh thánh được viết cho dàn nhạc, dàn hợp xướng và ca sĩ mà không sử dụng trang phục, hành động hay bất kỳ khung cảnh nào

words.defineEn: addressing an audience formally (usually a long and rhetorical address and often pompous)
words.defineVi: nói chuyện với khán giả một cách trang trọng (thường là một địa chỉ dài và khoa trương và thường khoa trương)

examples: And who were these early oracles?
But Bernie Sanders and Donald Trump became the oracles of this deep-seated sense of betrayal.
The U.S. Supreme Court handed Google a victory today in a copyright dispute with software developer Oracle.
The next work is another window of sorts, this one a painting by Miyoko Ito titled Oracle, made in 1967 and 68.
From the enterprise hardware standpoint, it's going to be Cisco, and Juniper, and Ericsson, and Oracle.
words.defineEn: a message or prophecy that is conveyed by a priest or priestess
words.defineVi: một thông điệp hoặc lời tiên tri được truyền đạt bởi một linh mục hoặc nữ tu sĩ

words.defineEn: of or relating to an oracle
words.defineVi: của hoặc liên quan đến một oracle

examples: (bubbles effervescing)
words.defineEn: become bubbly or frothy or foaming
words.defineVi: trở nên sủi bọt hoặc nổi bọt hoặc sủi bọt

examples: That one's like effervescent, - man.
Ooh it's effervescent.
It tastes just like the last one but effervescent.
Uh but yeah, that's very effervescent, very uh SweeTart-y just like - what I know a Red Bull to be.
words.defineEn: a type of drink that produces bubbles or fizz, often through the addition of carbon dioxide, creating a refreshing and invigorating texture and taste
words.defineVi: một loại đồ uống tạo ra bong bóng hoặc sủi bọt, thường thông qua việc bổ sung carbon dioxide, tạo ra kết cấu và hương vị sảng khoái và tràn đầy sinh lực

examples: You also had this sort of interesting confluence in American politics at the time.
What we saw in the days and weeks to follow that was the confluence of these multiple factors.
Thanks to a lucky confluence of events, those footprints have fossilized, at a site called Laetoli.
But a confluence of crises over the last year has perhaps tested the nation and its commander in chief more than any other in modern history.
This shimmering, dazzling, dancing display of light comes about from a confluence of chemistry, geology, and optics that define opals from their earliest moments, deep underground.
words.defineEn: a coming together of people
words.defineVi: một sự đến với nhau của mọi người

words.defineEn: flowing together
words.defineVi: chảy cùng nhau
